    About Namarunu-store pricing
  1. Namarunu doesn't take any fee from transactions. However, payment gateway fees from Mpesa or flutterwave may apply and are usually around 3%–4%
  2. Hosting, maintenance, backups, and updates are included in your plan. When new features are released, your eCommerce website is automatically updated.
  3. Prices do not include VAT.
